issue.title: Order recapitulation view : perimeter not loaded in map
issue.body:
**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 

In order (and request) recapitualation view, if the map is displayed in other SRS than EPSG:4326, a free perimeter can not be properly loaded.

In this case, the free perimeter coordinates have to be reprojected with proj4js library. But, the destination projection is never completely loaded (concretely, the flag 'readyToUse' is never set to true)...
The necessary definition files (EPSG and mercator js files) seem to be not available for transformation.

NB : test with EPSG:2056

comments.body:

Hi Hélène, is this still a problem ? We don't encounter it on EPSG:21781

**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène
